posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

1/22/23- 1/29/23
Issue - V136
Current Release: 1.18.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps
  • = components

Updates

  • See from @dataprofessor how to turn your research article into an interactive Streamlit app that can easily be shared with anyone!
  • Learn how to integrate semantic AI processing into your apps and use cases with Semantha and Streamlit.

Featured Content

  • MathGPT @napoles3d
  • Whom does your child look like?
  • Stuck learning Python? Make it fun with Streamlit! @SashaMitrovich

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Automate GitHub Readme.md file to Streamlit web App @avratanubiswas
  • Best prompts for MathGPT Streamlit app @napoles3d
  • NBA Over/Under Predictions on Streamlit and AWS EC2
  • Optical Glaucoma detection using Deep Learning And Streamlit With Segmentation
  • How to build a serverless electricity price prediction service in Python with Hopsworks + Streamlit
  • Deploy LayoutLMv3 for Document Classification using Streamlit, Transformers and HuggingFace Spaces
  • Building a real-time analytics dashboard with Streamlit, Apache Pinot, and Apache Kafka
  • Belajar Streamlit Bahasa Indonesia [Dasar]
  • Built a transcription app with Streamlit and OpenAI Whisper (code in description)
  • Adding UI using Streamlit (Part 2 of deploying GPT + FastAPI)
  • Build Technical analysis dashboard INTERACTIVE using Streamlit Python
  • Readme Generator Streamlit App using ChatGPT
  • Deploy GPT-3 Streamlit App on AWS EC2 | OpenAI | AWS Tutotrials
  • Comment j’ai construit ma propre application AutoML avec Streamlit ? [pycaret episode 4/4] NO-Code
  • How to make an image classification app with PyTorch and Streamlit
  • 101: Google Sheets API in Streamlit
  • Synthetic Data for your data products
  • How to add Meta Tags for your Streamlit project
  • Deliver Your Customer Behavior Analysis Report with Streamlit
  • Step-by-step guide to build Personalized Airbnb Recommendation App with Streamlit
  • Sentiment Analysis with Python and Streamlit
  • Create Your Chat GPT-3 Web App with Streamlit in Python
  • Create your painting app with AI and Streamlit
  • Creare un app web di intelligenza artificiale in 5 minuti
  • Машинное обучение с помощью Streamlit с использованием набора данных от Титаника +5
  • python未経験はstreamlitで写真を取るところから学べ！！
  • Yahoo APIで取得した現在の降水量をstreamlitで地図上に3D棒グラフ表示する
  • Deploying ML models straight from Jupyter Notebooks

Science and Tech

  • Diagnostically Predict if a Patient is Likely to Survive COVID-19
  • Application for demonstrating the PyHistology package
  • Heart Attack Predictor
  • PyTextureAnalysis

NLP and Language

  • Twitter Sentiment Analyzer
  • Essay writing app
  • Ask Bhagavad Gita
  • BibleGPT
  • Instant Info @ozgurdugmeci
  • Cover Letter AI
  • Final Streamlit Application

Data Visualization

  • Road Volumes Estimation
  • Exploratory Data Analysis of Iris Dataset
  • Titanic web app
  • Hourly energy consuption

CV and Images

  • Object Recognition Dashboard
  • Motor Accident Classification App
  • Image Filters

Sports

  • ITTFF Men’s Singles Rankings for 2023

Finance and Business

  • Churn Prediction
  • Cryptocurrency Price
  • Car price predictor
  • Diamond Price Predictor
  • Predice el precio de tu vehículo
  • NOC Wage Finder
  • Weekly Internet Sales Forecasting
  • Laptop Price Predictor
  • Convex Bribe Rounds
  • Activity of NEAR developers
  • Near Developer Activity
  • Product Comparison
  • demo streamlit P7 oc

Geography and Society

  • Análisis de los alojamientos turísticos en Madrid
  • LesGo | Travel itinerary maker
  • Morocco Prayers Times

General

  • Anime Recommender
  • N-Queens
  • Angpao Generator
  • Membuat Kalkukator Sederhana dengan Streamlit using Python
  • fyp prediction system v2· Streamlit

Cool happenings and other things

  • Streamlit’s Hidden Gems: 11 Community-Built Apps and some Components You Need to See @shruagarwal
  • Using StreamLit and Getting started with StreamLit Upcoming meetup Feb 15 @tony
  • Behind the Curtain: What it Takes to Support the World’s Most Popular Open Source Communities Upcoming talk March 10 @Katrina Riehl
  • Meetup: Building a real-time analytics dashboard with Streamlit, Apache Pinot, and Redpanda

Follow us

  • Twitter
